<<<<<<< HEAD
Advertisement. It is well known that in this kingdom is living an experienc'd and able physitian Dr. Peter Maris, who by the blessing of God has in his travels through five kingdoms done severall miraculous cures here in London since his coming over when left by others; He removes or prevents all diseases and distempers incident to the bodies of mankind. Maris, Peter.
1 sheet ([2] p.).
s.n., [London : 1700?]
Imprint from Wing. Caption title. With ornamental border. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
